title: 插件报错
author: 肋耨沃
txt_content:
itemlorestats插件问题
 blind:
    name: 致盲
    colour: '&7'
    sellValuePerStat: 10
    internalCooldown: 3
    effectDuration: 3
    effectAmplifier: 1
    prefix:
      colour: '&7'
      list:
      - Visionless
    suffix:
      colour: '&7'
      list:
      - of Blinding
在config看到的，但是在游戏里面输入 lore add &7致盲就会出现这个报错
 Could not pass event EntityDamageByEntityEvent to ItemLoreStats v7.71
org.bukkit.event.EventException: null
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader$1.execute(JavaPluginLoader.java:306) ~[spigot.jar:git-Spigot-2086bb0-21d5f75]

        at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.callEvent(SimplePluginManager.java:485) [spigot.jar:git-Spigot-2086bb0-21d5f75]

        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.event.CraftEventFactory.handleLivingEntityDamageEvent(CraftEventFactory.java:612) [spigot.jar:git-Spigot-2086bb0-21d5f75]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.EntityLiving.damageEntity0(EntityLiving.java:1346) [spigot.jar:git-Spigot-2086bb0-21d5f75]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.EntityLiving.damageEntity(EntityLiving.java:868) [spigot.jar:git-Spigot-2086bb0-21d5f75]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.EntityMonster.damageEntity(EntityMonster.java:44) [spigot.jar:git-Spigot-2086bb0-21d5f75]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.EntityHuman.attack(EntityHuman.java:1005) [spigot.jar:git-Spigot-2086bb0-21d5f75]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.EntityPlayer.attack(EntityPlayer.java:1311) [spigot.jar:git-Spigot-2086bb0-21d5f75]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.PlayerConnection.a(PlayerConnection.java:1621) [spigot.jar:git-Spigot-2086bb0-21d5f75]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.PacketPlayInUseEntity.a(SourceFile:69) [spigot.jar:git-Spigot-2086bb0-21d5f75]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.PacketPlayInUseEntity.a(SourceFile:13) [spigot.jar:git-Spigot-2086bb0-21d5f75]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.PlayerConnectionUtils$1.run(SourceFile:13) [spigot.jar:git-Spigot-2086bb0-21d5f75]
        at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_131]

Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: empty String

应该是我输错代码了？求dalao指教！！！！

replies.author: 冰星
replies.txt_content: 不是格式问题，这似乎是插件本身的问题

replies.author: 肋耨沃
replies.txt_content:
冰星 发表于 2019-6-20 09:10
不是格式问题，这似乎是插件本身的问题
可是
prefix:
      colour: '&7'
      list:
      - Visionless
    suffix:
      colour: '&7'
      list:
      - of Blinding我这个还没输入，而且我以前输入正确的时候好像可以，但现在忘记怎么输入了

replies.author: 冰星
replies.txt_content:
肋耨沃 发表于 2019-6-20 09:23
可是
prefix:
      colour: '&7'


尝试把这两个插件分离出来单独测试

replies.author: 肋耨沃
replies.txt_content: 已自行解决，方案：就是我输错指令了，这种命令的背后加上百分比就行了，会有效果的
